I spend time with my family and friends to feel better.
I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.
Oh, that's cool! I dislike animals though.
I don't know, I've just never been a fan of them.
Well, I can respect your opinion. I'm just glad that you have a hobby that you enjoy.
Yeah, it's pretty fun. I like to ride horses in my spare time.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to ride a horse.
It's not too hard to learn. I took a few lessons when I was younger and I was able to get the hang of it pretty quickly.
That's good to know. Maybe I'll look into taking some lessons myself.
I'm sure you'd enjoy it. It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely look into it.
